text:
#Pfizer-#BioNTech says #COVID19 #vaccine is 100% effective in kids ages 12 to 15. 

If approved by #FDA, would you allow your children in this age group to get #COVIDvaccine? #vaccination

A. Yes. 
B. No. 
C. Not sure. (Why?)

My report tonight at 9 on The CW and 10 on @NewsOn6 https://t.co/7WkKDz0lab
